description:
A popular manga artist is scheduled to come for a book signing. Honda-san discusses the taboos of sex and violence in manga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Inquiry / It`s a Book Signing!! Everyone Gather Up / A Fascinating Erotic Story
OTOIAWASE / サイン本だよ!! 全員集合 / 気になるエロの話
Otoiawase / Sign Hon Da yo!! Zen`in Shuugou / Ki ni Naru Ero no Hanashi
